Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our fitness app. By using our app, you consent to the practices described in this policy.

When you use our app\'s workout tracking feature, we collect information about your workout sessions, including exercise types, sets, reps, and weights used. This information is solely used to provide you with personalized workout tracking and progress analysis.

We may collect information about your exercise preferences, such as preferred workout duration, goals, and fitness level. This information helps us tailor the app\'s features to your needs and provide you with relevant recommendations.

During the account creation process, we collect certain basic information about you, including your first name, last name, date of birth, and email address. This information is used to personalize your app experience and communicate with you regarding your account and app-related updates.

We use the collected information to provide and improve our app\'s functionality, including workout tracking, progressive overload features, and personalized recommendations. The workout information is used to generate workout statistics and progress reports for your personal use.
We may use your email address to send you notifications, updates, and relevant information about our app. You have the option to opt out of receiving promotional materials at any time.

The user information and workout data are securely stored in a cloud database provided by Firestore. We take reasonable measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure.

We do not share your personal information with third parties for marketing purposes. However, we may engage third-party service providers who assist us in operating our app, including hosting and data storage. These service providers are contractually obligated to maintain the confidentiality and security of your information.

We retain your personal information, including workout data, for as long as necessary to provide you with the app\'s functionality and fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy. If you choose to delete your account, your personal information will be securely and permanently removed from our systems.

Our app is not intended for use by children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe we have inadvertently collected information from a child, please contact us immediately.

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or to comply with legal requirements. We will notify you of any material changes by providing a prominent notice within the app or through other communication channels. Your continued use of the app after the changes will signify your acceptance of the updated policy.
